item.title: Baby steps to Functional programming with Kotlin
item.description: When I started to work with RxJava it was extremely hard to get used to the reactive way of thinking and get a grasp on those wide ranges of operators, but no matter the difficulty the benefits are clear. With reactive programming, the code becomes good structured and beautifully organized.
